title: Spirituality and Psychiatry - SPSIG | Royal College of Psychiatrists
description: Find out about our Spirituality and Psychiatry Special Interest Group (SPSIG) and information on mental health and spirituality.
cleaned_text: Spirituality and Psychiatry Special Interest Group (SPSIG) A forum for psychiatrists to explore the spiritual challenges presented by psychiatric illness, and how best to respond to patients' spiritual concerns. The Spirituality and Psychiatry Special Interest Group (SPSIG) runs day conferences and helps develop relevant training. It offers an essay prize, hosts an extensive archive and liaises with relevant national and international bodies. There is a regular Chair's blog. [Read more about us and
